author: sandygao
msg: Fixing a schema traversal: while deferring the traversal of local elements,
we need to check the minOccurs value to make sure "emptiable particle"

author: neilg
msg: SAX 2.0 conformance bug.  When a null DTDHandler, ContentHandler, ErrorHandler or EntityResolver is registered with the XMLReader, SAX 2.0 clearly requires an NPE to be thrown.  While this is at variance with both SAX 1 and SAX 2.0.1, to conform to SAX 2.0 this behaviour is necessary.

author: neilg
msg: XML 1.1 parsing would not work if the parser was being reused.

author: elena
msg: We always attempt to find a prefix following the pattern "NS" +index (starting at 1).
Previously we kept global namespace counter to find an index..
